comment:
* Per-user state information about a package.
 * @hide

variables.name: hidden
variables.comment: Is the app restricted by owner / admin

methods.name: public void setSharedLibraryOverlayPaths(String library, String[] paths)
public boolean overrideLabelAndIcon(@NonNull ComponentName component, @Nullable String nonLocalizedLabel, @Nullable Integer icon)
methods.comment:
* Overrides the non-localized label and icon of a component.
     *
     * @return true if the label or icon was changed.

methods.name: public void resetOverrideComponentLabelIcon()
methods.comment:
* Clears all values previously set by {@link #overrideLabelAndIcon(ComponentName,
     * String, Integer)}.
     *
     * This is done when the package is updated as the components and resource IDs may have changed.

methods.name: public boolean isAvailable(int flags)
methods.comment: * Test if this package is installed.

public boolean isMatch(boolean isSystem, boolean isPackageEnabled, ParsedMainComponent component, int flags)
public boolean isMatch(boolean isSystem, boolean isPackageEnabled, boolean isComponentEnabled, boolean isComponentDirectBootAware, String componentName, int flags)
methods.comment:
* Test if the given component is considered installed, enabled and a match * for the given flags. * *

* Expects at least one of {@link PackageManager#MATCH_DIRECT_BOOT_AWARE} and * {@link PackageManager#MATCH_DIRECT_BOOT_UNAWARE} are specified in {@code flags}. *

*

methods.comment: * Test if the given component is considered enabled.
